# 8 Best Goal-Tracking Apps to Accomplish Your Goals

October 9, 2023October 27, 2022 by Rei Shen

Goal setting is vital to success, but countless people avoid it because
they’re scared of making mistakes. They realize that goal setting requires
excessive effort and time, which deters them even further.

But that doesn’t mean you can’t use tools to set goals, such as apps and
software. These practical tools play a positive role in keeping you
accountable.

If you are searching for apps to help you set and achieve goals, then this
post will list several goal-setting apps to increase your chances of success.

## What Are Goal-Tracking Apps?

Goal-tracking apps are exactly what they sound like—they’re mobile or web-
based applications that help you track your progress toward meeting specific
goals.

Most goal-tracking apps allow you to set and pursue multiple goals, and some
even let you share your progress with friends or family to stay accountable.

Some goal-tracking apps offer features like reminders, progress charts, and
gamification elements to keep you motivated. After all, when you see your
progress visually, you feel more encouraged to stay on top of your goals.

And if you’re the type who loves checking things off a list, you’ll find goal-
tracking apps truly satisfying.

## How to Choose a Goal-Tracking App

There are dozens of different goal-tracking apps on the market, so it can be
difficult to know which one is right for you.

Here are a few tips to keep in mind when choosing a goal-tracking app:

  * **Ease of use:** You should be able to effortlessly add new goals and track them.
  * **Goal types:** Make sure the app supports the kind of goals you want to measure.
  * **Reminders:** Look for an app that offers reminders to complete your tasks.
  * **Sharing:** If you want to share your progress with friends or family, ensure the app has that capability.
  * **Price:** Goal-tracking apps can range from free to several dollars. Choose the app that best fits your budget.

## 8 Best Goal-Tracking Apps

Below you will find the 8 best goal-tracking apps to accomplish your desired
goals in life:

### 1\. Strides

Strides is a wonderful goal-tracking app designed to help you achieve your
desired goals. The app sets reminders to practice daily habits, pushing you
further to goal attainment.

With Strides, you have the choice to set up daily, weekly, or monthly goals.
This makes it easier to check your results over time. You can also measure
progress with graphs and charts.

This is especially great for visually seeing how far you’ve come and what
still needs to be done. If you’ve been hoping to boost productivity and
accomplish your goals in life, Strides is the way to go.

Overall, you will be happy with Strides, and I recommend it to anyone looking
for a goal-tracking app.

**Available forIOS**

### 2\. LifeRPG

Setting and achieving goals is vital to a happy and successful life, but it
can be extremely tough to persevere.

That’s where LifeRPG comes in. LifeRPG is a goal-tracking app that helps you
to visualize your progress and stay inspired.

It’s based on the popular role-playing game format, in which players set
objectives and then earn points by completing tasks. This encourages users to
keep pushing themselves to reach their goals.

Besides that, LifeRPG features a social media-style feed, so you can see how
other users are doing and share tips and encouragement.

Whether you’re trying to save money or learn a brand-new skill, LifeRPG will
surely urge you to reach your objectives. So why not give it a try? It may
transform your whole life.

**Available forAndroid**

### 3\. Coach.me

Though some people may disagree, Coach.me is one of the leading apps for
tracking habits. This app has an excellent interface compared to others on the
market.

It’s simple to use and establishes accountability by encouraging healthy
habits. You are able to view weekly and monthly trends of your goal progress.
Not only that, you can create custom reminders for every one of your goals.

Furthermore, Coach.me has a built-in coaching system. You can even receive
guidance from an actual coach to help you accomplish your goals faster.

To hit your targets and objectives, it would be wise to take advantage of this
efficient goal-tracking app.

**Available foriOS | Android**

### 4\. Habitica

Anyone who has tried to develop a new habit knows that it can be a difficult
and frustrating process. It’s easy to get discouraged when you slip up or miss
a day, and it can be challenging to stay inspired.

Thankfully, there is an app called Habitica that takes the stress out of the
process by turning it into a game instead. With Habitica, you can set up tasks
and goals, and then check them off as you complete them.

You earn points for every task you complete, and you can use those points to
level up your avatar and unlock new features. There are also leaderboards and
achievements to add an extra element of competition.

Best of all, the app is free to use, so there’s nothing to lose by giving it a
try. Whether you’re trying to quit smoking or eat healthier, Habitica can make
developing a new habit a fun and rewarding experience.

**Available foriOS | Android**

### 5\. GoalsOnTrack

Have you ever set a goal but felt like you weren’t making progress? Maybe you
lost motivation or didn’t have a rigid system for pursuing your goals.

GoalsOnTrack is a goal-setting and tracking software program that can help you
overcome these challenges.

This software program is designed to set SMART goals—that is, Specific,
Measurable, Attainable, Relevant, and Time-based. But it doesn’t stop there.

Using GoalsOnTrack, you can break your goals down into small, manageable steps
and then check your progress over time. You can also set reminders so you
never forget to work on your goals.

Plus, the software program provides comprehensive reports to check how far
you’ve come. And if you hit a snag, don’t worry. The software provides tools
and resources to get you back on track.

If you’re looking for a way to streamline your goal-setting and achieve
success, check out this app today.

**Available foriOS**

### 6\. Todoist

Let’s face it, we all have a tendency to procrastinate from time to time.
Whether it’s putting off doing the laundry or avoiding that project at work,
we’ve all been there.

But when it comes to important goals, procrastination can be a real problem.
That’s where the Todoist app can come in handy.

Todoist is a task management app that lets you create to-do lists and set up
reminders. In order to attain your goals, give this app a try. You will
prevent yourself from getting overwhelmed with all the hustle and bustle of
life.

**Availability forIOS | Android**

### 7\. Way of Life

Way of life is an app that helps track your daily habits. It’s simple and easy
to use, which makes it a great way to get started with habit tracking.

This app has a clean interface to identify progress at a glance. Just download
the app and start adding goals and habits that you want to follow.

Once you’ve got everything set up, it only takes a few seconds each day to log
your progress. And if you ever fall behind, it’s easy to get back on course.
The app also makes it easy to see your progress over time.

There’s also a community aspect to the app, which allows you to share your
progress with other users and get encouragement from them.

Way of Life is a fantastic tool to stay motivated and on the path to goal
achievement. You just might be surprised at how much progress you can make.

**Available foriOS | Android**

### 8\. Toodledo

Have you ever felt like you haven’t accomplished anything in your daily life?
If so, you’re not alone.

With the never-ending demands of work, family, and social obligations, it is
sometimes tough to free up time for the most urgent tasks.

However, by taking a few minutes each day to plan and organize our time, we
can make great strides toward our goals.

Toodledo is an amazing tool for goal setting and time management. You can
create task lists, set due dates and reminders, and track your progress over
time.

What’s more, Toodledo is available on all major platforms, so you can stay
organized no matter where you are. Know that taking control of your time is
the first step towards meeting your goals.

**Available foriOS | Android**

## Final Thoughts

There is no question that setting goals are essential. But what’s often
overlooked is that accomplishing those goals requires tons of hard work and
dedication.

Fortunately, various goal-tracking apps are available to ensure you stay on
track. By setting reminders, measuring your progress, and providing
motivation, these apps make it much easier to reach your goals.

They can be customized to fit any goal, from getting your dream job to
exercising more. So if you’re serious about making positive changes, be sure
to take advantage of the goal-tracking tools at your disposal.
